name: Icon
description: `{{toTagName name}}` wraps Font Awesome free plan icons, {{toLink 'Solid' 'https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery&s=solid&m=free'}} and {{toLink 'Brands' 'https://fontawesome.com/icons?s=brands&m=free'}}, it'll enable you to configure the icon in a declarative way instead of using class names.

attributes.name: kui-label
attributes.description: The icon's label, used for screen readers

attributes.name: kui-icon
attributes.description: Predefined name of the icon to be displayed, {{toLink 'set of available icons' 'https://fontawesome.com/icons?d=gallery'}}

attributes.name: kui-size
attributes.description: The size of the icon, relative to the inherited `font-size` style value, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/sizing-icons'}}

attributes.name: kui-animate
attributes.description: Makes the icon spin or have it rotate with 8 steps, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/animating-icons'}}

attributes.name: kui-flip
attributes.description: Flips the Icon with the desired direction, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/rotating-icons'}}

attributes.name: kui-pull
attributes.description: Pull quotes or article icons, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/bordered-pulled-icons'}}

attributes.name: kui-rotate
attributes.description: Rotates the Icon with the given angel, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/rotating-icons'}}

attributes.name: kui-bordered
attributes.description: Adds a border arround the icon, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/bordered-pulled-icons'}}

attributes.name: kui-fixed-width
attributes.description: Apply the fixed width style on the icon, {{toLink 'more information' 'https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/fixed-width-icons'}}
